documentation.title: [ES] API Documentation
documentation.description: [ES] Learn how to use the GWI Agents API

help.title: [ES] How can we help?
help.subtitle: [ES] Search our knowledge base or browse topics below

gettingStarted.title: [ES] Getting Started Guide
gettingStarted.description: [ES] Learn the basics of GWI Agents

createAgent.question: [ES] How do I create my first agent?
createAgent.answer: [ES] Navigate to the Agents page from the sidebar and click 'Create Agent'. Follow the step-by-step wizard to configure your agent's name, description, data sources, and behavior settings.

dataSources.question: [ES] What data sources are available?
dataSources.answer: [ES] GWI provides access to multiple data sources including GWI Core (our flagship consumer survey), GWI USA, GWI Zeitgeist (trending topics), and the ability to upload custom data. Data source availability depends on your subscription tier.

inviteTeam.question: [ES] How do I invite team members?
inviteTeam.answer: [ES] Go to Settings > Team and click 'Invite Member'. Enter their email address and select their role (Admin, Editor, or Viewer). They'll receive an invitation email to join your workspace.

difference.question: [ES] What's the difference between agents and workflows?
difference.answer: [ES] Agents are AI-powered specialists that handle specific types of research tasks. Workflows combine multiple agents in a sequence to automate complex, multi-step research processes.

customize.question: [ES] Can I customize pre-built agents?
customize.answer: [ES] Yes! You can duplicate any pre-built agent and modify its configuration, including the system prompt, data sources, and output format. Your customized version will be saved to your personal agent library.

schedule.question: [ES] How do I schedule a workflow?
schedule.answer: [ES] Open your workflow and click the 'Schedule' button. You can set up recurring runs (daily, weekly, monthly) or trigger workflows based on events like new data availability.

protection.question: [ES] How is my data protected?
protection.answer: [ES] All data is encrypted at rest and in transit using industry-standard AES-256 encryption. We're SOC 2 Type II certified and GDPR compliant. Your queries and custom data are never shared with other customers.

export.question: [ES] Can I export my data?
export.answer: [ES] Yes, you can export data in multiple formats including CSV, Excel, PowerPoint, and JSON. Enterprise customers also have access to direct database connections and API exports.

updateFrequency.question: [ES] How often is the GWI data updated?
updateFrequency.answer: [ES] GWI Core data is updated quarterly with fresh consumer surveys. GWI Zeitgeist provides weekly updates on trending topics. Some specialized datasets may have different update frequencies.

queryCount.question: [ES] What counts as a query?
queryCount.answer: [ES] A query is any request made to an agent, including follow-up questions within the same conversation. Complex multi-step workflows count as a single query regardless of how many agents are involved.

changePlan.question: [ES] Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
changePlan.answer: [ES] Yes, you can change your plan at any time from Settings > Billing. Upgrades take effect immediately with prorated billing. Downgrades take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.

annualDiscount.question: [ES] Do you offer annual billing discounts?
annualDiscount.answer: [ES] Yes! Annual billing saves you 20% compared to monthly billing. Contact our sales team to set up annual billing or switch from monthly.

personas.title: [ES] Building Effective Personas
personas.description: [ES] Learn how to create detailed, actionable audience personas

workflows.title: [ES] Workflow Automation Best Practices
workflows.description: [ES] Design efficient multi-agent workflows for your research

prompts.description: [ES] Get better results with optimized agent prompts

apiIntegration.title: [ES] API Integration Guide
apiIntegration.description: [ES] Connect GWI agents to your existing tools

liveChat.title: [ES] Live Chat
liveChat.description: [ES] Chat with our support team in real-time
liveChat.availability: [ES] Available Monday-Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM EST. Average response time: 2 minutes.

ticket.title: [ES] Submit a Ticket
ticket.description: [ES] Get help via email within 24 hours
ticket.info: [ES] For complex issues or feature requests. Include as much detail as possible.

enterprise.title: [ES] Enterprise Support
enterprise.description: [ES] Need dedicated support? Enterprise plans include a dedicated Customer Success Manager and priority response times.

hero.title: Conocimiento del consumidor impulsado por IA
hero.subtitle: Descubra una comprensión profunda del consumidor con análisis impulsado por IA de datos de encuestas globales
hero.badge: [ES] Now with Real LLM Execution, SSO/SAML, Scheduled Workflows & Multi-Format Reports
hero.analyzing: [ES] Analyzing Gen Z motivations around sustainable fashion choices and brand loyalty drivers...
hero.personaArchitectDesc: [ES] Building detailed audience personas based on behavioral patterns and values
hero.insightText: [ES] 73% of Gen Z prioritize brand authenticity over price
hero.compareQuestion: [ES] Compare sustainability attitudes between Gen Z and Millennials
hero.analysisResponse: [ES] Based on our analysis of 450K consumers across 12 markets, Gen Z shows 34% higher engagement with sustainability messaging...

features.title: Características potentes
features.subtitle: Todo lo que necesita para entender a su audiencia
features.realLlmExecutionDesc: [ES] Multi-provider support with Anthropic Claude, OpenAI GPT, and GWI Spark. No mock data—production-ready AI.
features.multiFormatReportsDesc: [ES] Export to PDF, PowerPoint, Excel, CSV, and HTML. AI-powered content generation with templates.
features.scheduledWorkflowsDesc: [ES] Automate workflows with cron scheduling. Set recurring runs and automated brand tracking snapshots.
features.ssoSamlDesc: [ES] Enterprise-ready authentication with Azure AD, Google Workspace, and custom SAML providers.
features.integrationsHubDesc: [ES] Connect Slack, Zapier, webhooks, and custom APIs. Build integrations with 5000+ tools.
features.enterpriseReliabilityDesc: [ES] Circuit breakers, retry logic, request timeouts, and automatic failover ensure 99.9% uptime.
features.advancedAnalyticsDesc: [ES] Comprehensive usage dashboards with token tracking, cost estimation, and performance metrics.
features.contextAwareAgentsDesc: [ES] Agents access memory context automatically. Persistent knowledge across sessions and workflows.
features.multiModePlaygroundDesc: [ES] Switch between Chat, Canvas, and Split views. Build insights visually with drag-and-drop blocks.
features.visualWorkflowBuilderDesc: [ES] Orchestrate complex analysis with drag-and-drop pipelines, triggers, and scheduled runs.
features.verifiedInsightsDesc: [ES] Every insight includes clickable citations, confidence scores, and transparent reasoning chains.
features.teamCollaborationDesc: [ES] Email invitations, role-based access control, and comprehensive audit logs for security.

pricing.title: Precios simples y transparentes
pricing.subtitle: Elija el plan que se adapte a sus necesidades
pricing.starterDesc: [ES] For teams getting started with AI-powered human insights
pricing.professionalDesc: [ES] For growing teams with complex research needs
pricing.enterpriseDesc: [ES] For organizations requiring maximum scale and control

cta.title: ¿Listo para comenzar?
cta.subtitle: Únase a miles de empresas que usan GWI Insights

footer.brandDesc: [ES] Real-world, human-sourced data powering smarter business decisions since 2009.

playground.title: [ES] Three ways to build insights
playground.subtitle: [ES] Whether you prefer conversational AI, visual building, or both—the Playground adapts to your workflow.
playground.chatModeDesc: [ES] Conversational interface with streaming responses, sub-agent spawning, and inline citations.
playground.canvasModeDesc: [ES] Visual workspace with draggable blocks—charts, personas, tables, and insights.
playground.splitViewDesc: [ES] Chat on the left, live canvas preview on the right. See outputs as you build.
playground.cap1: [ES] Rich output blocks (charts, personas, data tables)
playground.cap4: [ES] Reasoning mode to see agent thinking
playground.cap6: [ES] Export to workflows, reports, or API
playground.quickActionsDescCont: [ES] to open the command palette and access:

agents.title: [ES] Pre-built human insights agents
agents.subtitle: [ES] Start with specialized agents designed for understanding people, or build your own in the Agent Playground.
agents.audienceExplorerDesc: [ES] Discovers who your audience really is—their values, behaviors, and what makes them tick.
agents.personaArchitectDesc: [ES] Builds rich, data-driven personas that bring your audiences to life with authentic human details.
agents.motivationDecoderDesc: [ES] Uncovers the 'why' behind consumer choices—the emotional and rational drivers of behavior.
agents.cultureTrackerDesc: [ES] Spots emerging cultural shifts and changing attitudes before they hit the mainstream.
agents.brandRelationshipAnalystDesc: [ES] Maps how people really feel about brands—loyalty drivers, switching triggers, and emotional connections.
agents.globalPerspectiveAgentDesc: [ES] Compares attitudes and behaviors across markets to find universal truths and local nuances.

inbox.title: [ES] AI that handles requests
inbox.subtitle: [ES] Connect your Slack channels and email inboxes. Inbox Agents automatically detect research requests, process them using your configured workflows, and deliver insights back to the requester.
inbox.feature2: [ES] Route to the right agent based on topic
inbox.feature4: [ES] Full audit trail of all processed requests
inbox.request1Message: [ES] Can you pull Gen Z attitudes toward sustainable fashion in the UK?
inbox.request2Message: [ES] Need a competitive analysis of streaming platforms for millennials
inbox.request3Message: [ES] What's the brand perception of Tesla among Gen X in Germany?

reports.title: [ES] From insight to deliverable
reports.subtitle: [ES] Transform your analysis into polished presentations, interactive dashboards, and comprehensive reports with AI-assisted editing and 8+ pre-built templates.

workflow.title: [ES] Build workflows in minutes,
workflow.subtitle: [ES] Our visual workflow builder lets you connect agents, define triggers, and orchestrate complex research pipelines without writing code.
workflow.step1Desc: [ES] Set your research goal and target audience
workflow.step2Desc: [ES] Choose specialized agents for your workflow
workflow.step3Desc: [ES] Connect agents and define data flows
workflow.step1Preview: [ES] Research objective: Identify Gen Z consumers interested in sustainable fashion across EU markets
workflow.step2Preview: [ES] Selected agents: Audience Strategist -> Creative Brief Builder -> Trend Forecaster
workflow.step3Preview: [ES] Pipeline configured with automatic handoffs and quality checkpoints
workflow.step4Preview: [ES] Executing workflow... Processing 2.4M consumer records across 8 markets
workflow.step5Preview: [ES] Analysis complete. 12 insights generated with 94% confidence score.
